oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Parents' Weekend Program, 1969
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Draft; Programs; Invitations; Promotional materials; Events
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Parents Weekend was an annual event inviting students' parents to visit Christian Brothers' campus. Festivities included the Red and White basketball game, tours of campus, laboratory demonstrations, and visits with selected professors. One notable speaker, considering this came at the height of the Vietnam War, was a guest speaker on the draft.
